cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface.
This pattern references a specific artefact, usually a tablet.

div.l: nun gal geš-he2 uraš!?(UR) ⸢ku3⸣-gin7? gub-bu a2? [...]
sul {d}utu AN x tal2 kur-kur ug3 lu-a! dagal#? nam?-[...]
ur-sag gal kal {d}a-nun-na-e-ne me-ni dingir na-me sag nu-ga2-ga2
ku3-zu nig2-nam-ma gizzal nig2-si-sa2 za3? nu-ša4#?
ur-sag sul {d}utu du11-ga dugud inim zi-de3 nam-dingir-ra-ni za3 nu-sa2!
u4 dingir ulu3? gal dingir-re-e-ne ⸢ki⸣-tuš mah ki#? ku3-ga-kam
ug3 kur-kur ki-bi gi4-gi4-de3 lugal-bi-ir nam-ti#? šum2-mu-de3#?
geš-hur#? garza dingir-re-e-ne gal-bi x-e-de3 ša3 ku3-ga zi-de3-eš nam-tum2-e#?
u4 <...>-la? {d}en-lil2-le mes zi {geš}isimu2{+mu2}-e? ba?-du3?
ri-im-nanna-gu10 nam-bara2? ga ubur sub? immal2? gal?-la-aš?
larsa{ki} kur šuba4-ta? igi il2-la-ni zi-de3-eš mu-ni-in-gal2?
sipa#? <sag?>-gig?-ga?-ni-še3 ša3-ga-na hul2 HAR?-ra? x x zi-de3-eš silim du11-du11
⸢sag⸣-ki zalag-ga-ni igi? he-mu-ši-in-bar-x-x
x {d}utu?
Lord, bull(?) ...
Great prince that stands (within?) the firmament like holy Uraš(?) ...
Youth Utu, spread out ..., (in) the lands ... the teeming and vast(ly populated) people
Great and mighty(?) hero, (from the) of the Anuna gods, no god can advance against his cosmic powers
Wise one who pays attention to(?) everything, (whose) justice(?) is without rival(?)
The hero, the youth Utu, (the one whose) utterance is weighty and word is true, his divinity is without rival
The sunlight(?), the mighty(?) and great god(?) of the gods, (whose) supreme dwelling is a pure place
In order to restore the people of the lands (to) their place and to give life to its king
He has faithfully planned with a pure heart to greatly ... the plans and rites of the gods
... Enlil planted this true hero/mes tree(?) as an offshoot(?)
On behalf of(?) my Rīm-Sîn, who suckled milk at the teat of the great wild cow (for!? his) rulership
He faithfully looked(?) with his raised eye at (remote) larsa, the mountain of šuba stones(?)
Shepherd who rejoices in his heart due to the black-headed people(?) and faithfully greets(?) ...
May he look towards him with his shining forehead(?)
... of Utu(?)
